alert.note: Alert for Lower Jefferson; Northern Orange; Southern Orange; Upper Jefferson (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 12 at 4:31AM CST by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHWESTERN CAMERON AND SOUTHWESTERN CALCASIEU PARISHES...JEFFERSON AND ORANGE COUNTIES THROUGH 500 AM CST... At 431 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Fannett, or 7 miles northeast of Hamshire, moving northeast at 75 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Beaumont, Port Arthur, Orange, Nederland, Groves, Port Neches, Vidor, Bridge City, West Orange, Vinton, Central Gardens, Sabine Pass, Johnsons Bayou, Hamshire, Sabine National Wildlife, China, Rose City, Pine Forest, Port Acres, and Toomey. This includes the following highways... Interstate 10 in Texas between mile markers 880 and 832. Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 1 and 12. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Lower Jefferson; Northern Orange; Southern Orange; Upper Jefferson
